text:
London - UK

Disclaimer: I'm a developer myself, I made this list out of necessity while looking for a job in London last month.

Last "Who is Hiring June 2012" didn't have any jobs in London!

http://roundabout.io

The list is far from comprehensive, but if you're a developer in London you should definitely have a look at it, there are more than 30 startups listed, and not all of them post in this thread.
